word: The question is sometimes asked, "Why build schoolhouses, sanitariums, food stores, or churches, when time is so short?" The Lord's money is to be invested wisely. In many places where the work has been shamefully neglected plants must be established that will be producers as well as consumers. Memorials for God should be established in every place as an aid in the proclamation of the last message of mercy. Missionary work should be done in every city.
